com.noisepages.nettoyeur.bluetooth.midi

Class BluetoothMidiService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.noisepages.nettoyeur.bluetooth.midi.BluetoothMidiService

  • public class BluetoothMidiService
extends Service
    Service for MIDI over Bluetooth using SPP. Note that these methods choose sanity over compliance with the MIDI standard, i.e., channel numbers start at 0, and pitch bend values are centered at 0.
    Author:
    Peter Brinkmann

      • init

        public void init(BluetoothMidiReceiver receiver)
          throws IOException
        This method must be called before any other methods are called. It sets the receiver for handling events read from the Bluetooth input stream.
        Parameters:
        receiver -
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if Bluetooth is unavailable or disabled

      • connect

        public void connect(String addr)
             throws IOException
        Attempts to connect to the given Bluetooth device.
        Parameters:
        addr - String representation of the MAC address of the Bluetooth device
        Throws:
        IOException

      • connect

        public void connect(String addr,
           Intent intent,
           String description)
             throws IOException
        Attempts to connect to the given Bluetooth device with foreground privileges.
        Parameters:
        addr - String representation of the MAC address of the Bluetooth device
        intent - intent to be wrapped in a pending intent and fired when the user selects the notification
        description - description of the notification
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getState

        public BluetoothSppConnection.State getState()
        Returns:
        the current state of the Bluetooth connection

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops all Bluetooth threads and closes the Bluetooth connection.

      • sendPitchbend

        public void sendPitchbend(int ch,
                 int val)
                   throws IOException
        Sends a pitch bend event to the Bluetooth device.
        Parameters:
        ch - channel starting at 0
        val - pitch bend value centered at 0, ranging from -8192 to 8191
        Throws:
        IOException

      • sendRawByte

        public void sendRawByte(int value)
                 throws IOException
        Sends a raw MIDI byte to the Bluetooth device.
        Parameters:
        value - MIDI byte to send to device; only the LSB will be sent
        Throws:
        IOException
